Hi Simon,

A few quick questions/remarks:

   - Why do you initialize the f=
ractions in @Before and not @BeforeClass,
   since you don't seem to ever m=
odify them?
   - Why assigning them to null in @After?
   - Given the natur=
e of your tests, I would probably use parameterized
   tests to supply only=
 the data that each test needs instead of making these
   eight fields avai=
lable to all the test methods all the time.

-- 
C=E9dric
